alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 05 at 4:35AM MDT until July 05 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 103 degrees expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...From noon until 8 PM MDT today and Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The hottest temperatures will be at the bottom of the Rio Grande Valley with slightly cooler readings near the foothills.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Do not to leave children and pets in a broiling hot car.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
